llm_command:
kubectl apply -n productcatalogservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-recommendation-to-productcatalog
  namespace: productcatalogservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: productcatalogservice
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: recommendationservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 3550
EOF
